markdown:
**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 167 1.1 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- Moss and winding vines give this gnarled staff of wild wood a vibrant green tinge. You created this staff to aid you in speaking to the plants you met on your adventure and beseeching them to come to your aid. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Staff of Nature's Cunning **Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 167 1.1 **Price** 250 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_tanglefoot_](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)
  • **1st** [_protector tree_](/Spells.aspx?ID=976), [_shillelagh_](/Spells.aspx?ID=282)
  • **2nd** [_entangle_](/Spells.aspx?ID=103), [_shape wood_](/Spells.aspx?ID=277)
Staff of Nature's Cunning (Greater) **Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 167 1.1 **Price** 1,400 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **3rd** [_tree shape_](/Spells.aspx?ID=342), [_wall of thorns_](/Spells.aspx?ID=366)
  • **4th** [_barkskin_](/Spells.aspx?ID=20), [_speak with plants_](/Spells.aspx?ID=294)
Staff of Nature's Cunning (Major) **Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 167 1.1 **Price** 6,500 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **5th** [_plant form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=223), _wall of thorns_
  • **6th** [_nature's reprisal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=954), _plant form_
name: Staff of Nature's Cunning (Major)
